revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Abundant Shrine |image = [[File:Abundant Shrine.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Abundant Shrine. |tokens = 306,500 |location = Unova Route 14 }} '''Abundant Shrine''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 4,803,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix || rowspan=2|[[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Wes || rowspan=2|[[File:Skorupi.png|40px]] Skorupi, [[File:Seviper.png|40px]] Seviper |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Marill.png|40px]] Marill || rowspan=3|[[File:Twins.png|40px]] Twins Rae & Ula || rowspan=3|[[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Swablu, [[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Swablu |- | [[File:Azumarill.png|40px]] Azumarill |- | [[File:Swablu.png|40px]] Swablu |- | [[File:Bronzor.png|40px]] Bronzor || rowspan=3|[[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Lurleen || rowspan=3|[[File:Deerling_(Spring).png|30px]] Deerling (spring), [[File:Zangoose.png|40px]] Zangoose |- | [[File:Cottonee.png|40px]] Cottonee |- | [[File:Petilil.png|40px]] Petilil |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen || rowspan=3|[[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Jaye || rowspan=3|[[File:Karrablast.png|40px]] Karrablast, [[File:Shelmet.png|40px]] Shelmet, [[File:Joltik.png|40px]] Joltik, [[File:Scolipede.png|40px]] Scolipede |- | [[File:Basculin (Red-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Red-Striped) |- | [[File:Basculin (Blue-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Blue-Striped) |}
